data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eva Sprecher- Uebersax, Mauro Daccordi (2016): Notes on the species of Plagiodera CHEVROLAT, 1836 of the Australian, Oceanic and Oriental regions, with a description of P. hiekei n. sp. (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae). Entomologische Blätter und Coleoptera 112 (1): 373-385, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.3095951|1 occurrence
